# Pull Request Template

## Description
Please include a summary of the changes and which issue this PR addresses.

**Related Issue:** Fixes #(issue number)

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update

## Changes Made
- List your changes here
- ...

## Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`python tests.py`)
- [ ] Added new tests for new functionality
- [ ] Tested on Windows
- [ ] Tested on Linux
- [ ] Tested on macOS

## Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] QUICKSTART.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] Added/updated docstrings
- [ ] LICENSE compliance checked

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] New tests added and passing
- [ ] No breaking changes introduced
- [ ] I understand the strict license terms
- [ ] I take responsibility for my contribution
